name: Remember the Way (MissVictorianLady, caiojmini, ilopesm, NelsonOokami)
name_original: Remember the Way (MissVictorianLady, caiojmini, ilopesm, NelsonOokami)
description:
Se ao acordar não reconhecesse onde estivesse, o que faria? Exploraria o ambiente? Nesse game, não seria o recomendado...

"What if you woke up in a place you didn't recognize?  Would you explore your newly discovered environment? It wouldn't be advised in this game...

Feito em 72 horas para a game jam da Ludum Dare #47

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #47 game jam.

Nelson Gaspar: Game Designer / Level Designer

Caio M. Jiacomini: Audio Designer (Instagram)

Isaac Lopes: Programmer

Camila Rocha: Narrative Designer

Assets by Hyptosis (Thank you!)
